但“乱”里边有生气","digest":"从40年前带着“泥土味”步入文坛，到今天成为世界级文学名家，贾平凹一直深深植根于那片带给他无限灵感的三秦大地，关注着社会的发展变迁和平凡人的命运。这次来到贵阳参加第五次汉学家文化翻译国际研讨会，贾平凹先生接受了本台记者的专访。","content":"","fileid":503218605,"content_url":"http:\/\/mp.weixin.qq.com\/s?__biz=MzA5ODMyODYzMQ==&mid=2650702265&idx=1&sn=d7a5aaae2f8e9805037bf833f6a7ca75&chksm=889968e1bfeee1f7330132606c108a1b592b379812c30d5b6e1c2edd744e64c0c36ef2d4c3db&scene=27#wechat_redirect","source_url":"","cover":"http:\/\/mmbiz.qpic.cn\/mmbiz_jpg\/micmdvu3gcrfyNR6QJMvoX0fsiaxQ2078bRMeAb8P4Hhf17e3ftjAiaFNZBA88jr3RogqbNYHaGzoWNwAw2dNibiczw\/0?wx_fmt=jpeg","subtype":9,"is_multi":1,"multi_app_msg_item_list":[{"title":"万山：脱贫产业发展旺
